description:
Tarvos Talent is seeking a Social Media Manager for a client located in North Austin. The Social Media Manager will join a fast-growing an innovative company that takes pride in its people-first culture. This role offers a competitive compensation package and the ability to influence the direction of a growing department within this organization, with a particular emphasis on LinkedIn advertising and the creation of engaging content.
The Social Media Marketing Manager will be responsible for copy writing, content creation, graphic design, and the creation, implementation, and analysis of successful social media campaigns.
The Social Media Marketing Manager will need to have a bachelor’s degree and 2+ years of experience.
For immediate and confidential consideration, please email your resume to Julie Lake Adams at jlakeadams@tarvostalent.com.
